meanings.definition: The complex structures within a cell that are not visible under a standard microscope.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the ultrastructures of cells using advanced technology.
meanings.sent2: The biologist examined the ultrastructures of the cell under an electron microscope.
meanings.sent3: When the microscope broke, the ultrastructures of the cell remained a mystery.
meanings.sent4: The ultrastructures of the cell were like a hidden city waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The ultrastructures of the cell resembled a tiny, intricate world within.

meanings.definition: The detailed organization of components within a material or system.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the ultrastructures of a material helps in improving its properties.
meanings.sent2: The engineer analyzed the ultrastructures of the alloy to enhance its strength.
meanings.sent3: The ultrastructures of the system were so well-organized, it was like a perfectly arranged puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The ultrastructures of the material were like a blueprint for its functionality.
meanings.sent5: The ultrastructures of the system were as intricate as a complex machine.
